text: tho mokada dan thawa balan inne..thawa ganu athak langata heththu karannada?
ihala damu sini thoga mila rupiyal 4kin pahala yayi
walakulu ge adahasata mayiya sthuthiya..me gana thawa hoyala balannam..
ema salakunu obe jiwithayata kumana aakarayakin balapanawa da kiya dan salaka balamu.

ewani thaththwayak matha hitihatiye meki naththal gasa pilibandawa ratama katha karannata wuye kolambaa agaradaguru malkam ranjith kadinalthumage wishesha adahas dakwimak matha mema naththal gase idikirim katayuthu atharamaga nathara kara damimath samagaya.
nandalal wishramika rajaye sewakayeki.
"gotabhaya agamathi kirimata maithrige salasumak"
ese wuwath budunwahanse thama gihi pawidi shrawakayanta aahara pana ganna akaraya pilibadawa upades dunna.
eeta amatharawa duminda silwa mahathata wedi wadunu siddhiya anek parshawaya wisin aarambha kara thibuna da thinduwa labadimedi eya nosalaka hara athi bawa janadhipathi nithignyawaraya pawasiya.
api dannawa ranjan ramanayakage durakathana amathum patigatha kara thibuna.
rajya mattame purna anugrahaya athuwayi 15 wana sumathi sammana ulela mewara pawathwenne.
enisa samahara aahara warga pamanak anubhawa kirimata purudu wi athi kuda lamun wani ayata ema aaharaya tika kalak yamedi nirasa wima nisa kusaginne sitina awastha pawa athi wi thibenawa.

kaban thira kirime di kadolanawala karyabharaya kadolana wanantharawala shakawala jaiwa skandhaya thula ha pase thira kala haki kaban dayoksayid wimochana pramanaya ihala bawa me wana wita piligena athi karunaki. 2011 warshaye di prakashayata path wu adhyayanayakata anuwa niwarthana warsha wananthara men pas gunayak tharam adhika kaban dayoksayid pramanayak kadolanawala thira kala haki ya.
anuradhapuraye sup rasiddha sandakadapahana pihita aththe abhayagiri wiharayeya.
eeth “aadaraya” anith aya wage dupathin ikmanin pala yanna kamathi wune na.

bas rathaya motar ratha dekak pasukara idiriyata yamata uthsaha darimedi mema anathura siduwa athi bawa polisiya kiyayi.

ee unata hithata danenne harima mahansi hangim..

nisi paridi asungatha wi niwaradiwa pingana thabagena athin aahara ganna hati daruwanta huru karanna.
uthuru diga beheyira palathe dumriya margayaka anathura siduwu bawa wides madhya wartha karanawa.

udaharana lesa, sinhala, demala saha muslim ho wenath janawargayan hi rajya sewaka sthrin wetha, osariya ho sariya andina lesa balakarana chakra lekhanaya(warthamanaye di eya athhituwa atha), sinhala- bauddha sthrin wetha swetha warnaya da muslim sthrin wetha kala warnayada pithru mulika aagama wisin thora dima, kanthawange adhyapanaya muslim samajaye di, pawula wisin thiranaya kirima da, sthrin wisin daruwan wadime sankhawa aagama wisin thiranaya kirima da penwa diya haka.
mun sewaya karanne kohetada kiyala bohoma pahadiliyi me welawata.
satahana 1 anatha wayasa awurudu 21 pirunu aya pudgalikawa pradeshiya lekami thuma hamu wi wishrama watupa dirga kirime poramaya pirawiya yuthuya

pare indan padipela nagala oya kandiye thiyena midula kallen yanna thiyena ofisiya athulata gihin thamayi aluth panthiyata bandenna oona...ape panthiya witharak neweyi thawa panthi kipayakma patan gannawa wage...
sathi kihipayakma samahara dawaswalata me awathara ma daka thibenawa.

yahapath palath palanayak saha mathiwarana kalaya thula prachandakari thaththwayangen thorawa mathiwaranaya pawathwimata nam ee sandaha sudusu apekshakayin thoraganima wadagath wana bawa da hethema awadharanaya kara sitiyeya.
ohu kese thama gana sithuwath dan thamata thama gana wishwasayak thibe.

jemis (65) mahatha mage daruwan hathara denek ipadune mema dewahuwe mathru niwasaye.
me rupaye dakwa thibena
dan balanna, nona monahari kiwwama mama eyage adahasata garu karala ekannaga wenawa.
wenas wenna oona me aakalpa..
urahis samahara wita boho palal we.
ee nisayi mama mehema inne.
“thopata thopage kodiya danma mehi osawannata idak naha.
dadli mathithuma wisin mathiwaranayak kadawu athara, ehidi ekasath jathika pakshaya parlimenthuwe aasana 54 k laba ganimata samath wiya.
mata nam hithenne oya sulu waradi sambandhayen koyi rate wunath nithiya tikak namyashili wenna oona kiyala.
mudal amathige ayawaya purajeruwe hulan bahi..
kese wethath sancharaya sandaha sahabhagi wanne rawindra silwa ya.
dan, dawantha antharayan pawathina namudu suwishala shakyathawan da thibe.
eeka lokaya pura siddha wenne ada eeyeka i`dala neweyi.
inpasu siyalu denama wadiya hurunathi wunath bod lali wagayak ussan ka gasamin idiriyata gaman gani.

sanjiwanige demawpiyan, age samiya, puthanuwan dedena, susana bhumiyedi handa watunu awasthawe di, mage papuwe gini guliyak paththuwena bawath, ugure giniyam yakada bolayak randi thibena bawath mata danuni.
achchuwa wenas karanawa wenuwata godak aya karanne ee achchuwa athule awurudu ganak themparadu wechcha minissunwa wenas karanna walikana eka ne chinthaka.

eyage wadakatayuthu ekka mage upan dinayata eyata enna bari wuna.
samaharu lokaya dakinne sudu kalu ho hari waradi washayen .

mahanama hamuduruwanwa hariyata therun ganne nathuwa.

yudde sambanda kisima puwathak palakaranta baya kiyala.puwath baladharaya hatiyata pathkale prawruththi adhyaksha thanathure hitapu aariya rubasinha mahathmaya.ee dawaswala thibba yukthiya kiyala tabloyid pramanaye paththarayak.karthru hitiye sunanda deshapriya.dan oya prawruththi sakachcha ehema thiyala ape le pirisidu karana konangiyage bhumikawa baragena inna mahinda deshapriya nohoth ma.ko. kiyanne sunandage malli.
edath para maru wenna kiyala api aapu bayisikal hemhita para ayine nawaththala signal dala wata pita balala thamayi dakunu haras margayata danna lasthi une.
me dewal mulin wishwasa nokalath wishwasa kirimata siduwela thiyanawa.
ara modi nisa thamayi hamadema.
miniha kiyuwe, kadeka dakkath, owun, meya ekka katha karanne naha kiyala.
mata post eka hadanna godak wela yana hinda ma...
apita gahala, apiwa hire dala eede karanna baha kiyala me aya therumganna oona game pakshikayo inne mahindath ekkayi nathuwa pakshayath ekka neweyi.
mema lipi pela gana oba dakwana adahas apage idiri gamanata diri ganwimak wewi....

wisheshayen warshawath samanga lin jalayata wikirana ekathu wiya haki bawata atham asathya pracharayan pathira yana bawath ese sidu wimata kisidu hethuwak nomathi bawath mahacharya dabliw.abewikrama mahatha pawasuweya.
ee wunata mage thaththa kamathi wune naha mama narthanaya igena gannawata.
eyata nanna oone wunama karanne welasana indalama andum ,saban ,panittuwak ehema ge issarahin thiyala api hamogenma ahanawa kawuda enne mata wathura adala denna?
mehema therumak hithilama na ne.sthuthiyi male...:))
mamane buddagama danne.
aththatama me dawaswala aarthikaya wardhanaya wenne 4%k wage ganak.
ohu thawath sirawi sitina aya sewimata nawathath geya thulata giyeya.
wassakatawath iskole giye nathi ekek liyapu ekak wageyi.

puthu athulu deshapalana sirakaruwan wadha bandhana walin nidahas karana se daniyel orthega ge mawa nikaraguwa aganuwara upawasayak kala athara pasuwa sandinisthanu sirakaruwan samaga hira gedarin eliyata pamini hethema jiwitharakshawa patha kiyubawata pala giyeya.

namayojana bharaganima juli masa 12 sita 19 wana dina dakwa 2012 juni 29 weni sikurada, 11:22	sakasanaya	wisuruwa harina lada palath sabha 03 hi matharawanaya nama yojana kandawima awasan wu pasu sapthambar 01, 08 ho 15 yana dina athurin ek dinaka di pawathwima pilibandawa thiranaya kerena bawa mathiwarana komasaris mahinda deshapriya mahatha pawasayi.
“mokak..me mama..thamuseta pissuda halo..“
@sarath lankapriya = ane manda macho eeth hora gawatama gihin horage depayaya gawa nathara wechcha kanappu pawa thibila thiyanawa kiyala mama ahala thiyanawa
pilithura- gotabhaya mahaththaya enawada nadda kiyana eka thiranaya wennath kalin ayi ohuta pahara denne.
api janadhipathithumage upades matha meksikowedi pawathi 14 wani loka tharunayan pilibanda samuluwedi illa sitiya eelanga samuluwa mehi thiyanna awasthawa labadenna kiya.
